short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate your potential grades in D2L courses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The D2L Grade Scanner and Predictor Tool is a browser extension or application designed to streamline academic performance tracking directly from the D2L platform. It scans your grades from the Grades tab, calculates your overall grade, and allows you to input hypothetical scores to predict how future performance will impact your final grade.

Features:

Grade Scanning & Importing:

Automatically detects and imports grades from the D2L Grades tab.
Recognizes graded items, total points, weights, and categories (if applicable).

Real-Time Grade Calculation:

Provides real-time updates on your current grade percentage.
Displays weighted averages for categories if your course uses weighted grading.

Hypothetical Grade Simulator:

Allows you to input potential grades for assignments, quizzes, or exams not yet graded.

Shows how these hypothetical scores would impact your overall course grade.
Customizable Scenarios:

Create multiple hypothetical scenarios (e.g., "If I score 85% on the final exam").
Save scenarios for comparison or planning.


How It Works:

Integration: Install the tool as a browser extension (Chrome, Edge, etc.) or standalone application.

Data Import: Log into D2L and navigate to the Grades tab. The tool automatically scans and imports grade data.

Grade Prediction: Use the hypothetical grade simulator to test different performance outcomes.

Analysis: Review visualizations and insights to understand your academic standing and areas for improvement.

Security and Privacy: The tool operates locally on your device and does not store or share your grades or personal data externally.
